titles.title: Honoring the members of the Massachusetts Air National Guard's 102nd Fighter Wing for their extraordinary performance, leadership, and dedication to duty in support of Operation Noble Eagle and in providing combat air patrols during and immediately following the terrorist attacks on the Nation on September 11, 2001.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Military Personnel.

bill.summary: 5/22/2002--Introduced. Acknowledges the tremendous accomplishments of the Massachusetts Air National Guard's 102nd Fighter Wing in response to the terrorist attacks on the Nation on September 11, 2001.Commends the members of the 102nd Fighter Wing for their extraordinary performance, leadership, and dedication to duty in support of Operation Noble Eagle, and in providing combat air patrols during and immediately following such attacks.
